hero.title: Build today, think tomorrow
hero.subtitle: Promoting a culture of sustainable building in Tunisia

why.title: Why Act?
why.reason1: Because the building sector alone still accounts for 40% of global emissions
why.reason2: Because resources are depleting, costs are constantly increasing, and climate risks are intensifying.
why.question: How can decision-makers, businesses, and citizens act together to build cities and territories that are more sober, more resilient, and more sustainable?

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Promote a culture of sustainable building in Tunisia by raising awareness, training and supporting public and private actors towards an ecological transition of the sector. As a member of WorldGBC, we contribute to building decarbonization and the circular economy.

business.title: Axis 1: Business
business.description: Support companies in their ecological transition and promote sustainable projects

campus.title: Axis 2: Campus
campus.description: Train the next generation in sustainable construction practices

awareness.title: Axis 3: Awareness
awareness.description: Educate and mobilize all actors in the building sector

advocacy.title: Axis 4: Advocacy
advocacy.description: Promote the integration of sustainable building into public policies, encourage fiscal and regulatory incentives, strengthen national and international alliances

innovation.title: Axis 5: Innovation and Startups
innovation.description: Present innovative local solutions for building and energy, provide a meeting space between startups, building actors and decision-makers, share concrete feedback on sustainable innovation in Tunisia

certification.title: Axis 6: Certification and Standards
certification.description: Develop and promote sustainable building certifications, establish national standards, support projects in their LEED, BREEAM and other international certification processes

cta.title: Join the Movement
cta.description: Become a TGBC member and contribute to building a sustainable future for Tunisia

about.title: About TGBC
about.subtitle: The Tunisia Green Building Council is the reference organization for promoting sustainable building in Tunisia

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description1: TGBC is an independent organization that brings together building professionals, academic institutions, public authorities and civil society around a common goal: transforming the construction sector in Tunisia towards greater sustainability.
vision.description2: As a member of the World Green Building Council, we actively contribute to global decarbonization and climate change adaptation goals, while responding to the specificities and needs of the Tunisian context.
